post.author: VoodooBenshee
post.body:
Name: Deathcity

Players: 1vs1

Game: Quake 4 Deathmatch

Description: A small deathmatch level set in village setting with fast gameplay.

Hope you like it

Download:
http://www.voodoobenshee.de/q4maps/dm_deathcity/dm_deathcity.zip

Screenshots:

post.author: 6th Venom
post.body: the visuals look good!

post.author: BNA!
post.body: Looks fine, I'd just try to break up the floor textures a little more - perhaps including some minor geometric changes of the ground (rip a few bricks out here an there, patch mesh dirty ground).

post.author: VoodooBenshee
post.body:
yes i agree - some changes on the floor is a very good idea. what about opened cracks filled with lava? and i think i have to make something with the lighting - it looks too bland.
ok i will make some reworks and release it later as a version 2.0 =)

post.author: VoodooBenshee
post.body:
Sorry for the second post =) first big thx for the feedback i got so i could make a lot of "fine-tuning". The map is now released as a version 2.0 (screen and the download link in the first post updated)

Changes Version 1.0 -> Version 2.0

- changed the env lighting - its a bit brighter and smoother now
- added some details - cracked floor, walls with pipes, texture replaces aso
- changed heavy armor to small armor
- napalm gun replaced with grenade launcher
- replaced napalm gun ammo to grenade gun ammo
- added one box at the rocket launcher place, to get a bit better on the second floor with rocket jump
